amendment.description: To make available from Research, Development, Test and Evaluation, Army, up to $10,000,000 for experimentation and refinement of tactics and doctrine in the use of the Class IV unmanned aerial vehicles and ground stations associated with such vehicles.

action.text: Amendment SA 4761 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Lott.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4761 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
